features: EFFECTIVE: Our anti-bacterial hand sanitiser kills 99.9% of bacteria and germs to protect you and your family.
GENTLE INGREDIENTS: US Lubrizol carbomer and 105° distilled water moisturises and hydrates your skin.
NO MESS: Non-sticky formula and pump dispenser. Suitable for both personal and commercial use and in all facilities and premises.
TRUSTWORTHY: Our 75% alcohol anti-bacterial hand gel is compliant with 11 EU standards including EN1650, EN1500 and EN1276. Always read the label and product information before use.
